pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a road under a partly cloudy sky, with a speed limit sign of 30 km/h visible near a small bridge. A motorcycle appears from the left side of the frame, approaching the bridge. The motorcycle continues to move forward, crossing the bridge. The motorcycle successfully crosses the bridge and moves out of the frame. The camera then moves forward, focusing on the bridge and the road ahead.
